data.title: Steve Gilbert
meta_keywords: Agency for Freelance Film and TV crew
data.meta_description: Steve Gilbert has over 30 years of experience working as a Key Grip in Film and Television. He is dedicated, a great problem solver and very experienced at the job. You can trust that he will go above and beyond to provide the very best performance....
data.text:
Steve Gilbert has over 30 years of experience working as a Key Grip in Film and Television. He is dedicated, a great problem solver and very experienced at the job. You can trust that he will go above and beyond to provide the very best performance.

Steve is proficient in Dollies (Hybrid 3, Hustler 4, All Fisher Dollies 9,10, 11 and all Panther Dollies); Jib Arms (Lenny 2,3 Crane Arms); Giraffe, Phoenix and Tulip Cranes; Hydroscope Cranes (Chapman 20, 32, 43, 73); Technocrane (21); Supertechno (22, 30, 50); Moviebird (35, 45); Car rigs on all types of vehicles; Sliders; Also proficient in level and set up of all types of dolly track.

Steve has completed Safe Sets International COVID-19 (Level A) for the Film and Video Production Industry.
